CustomField.formula: IF(ABS(DATETIMEVALUE( Initiated_Date__c ) - DATETIMEVALUE(TODAY())) < ABS(DATETIMEVALUE( Initiated_Date__c ) - DATETIMEVALUE(CompletedDateTime)),ABS(DATETIMEVALUE( Initiated_Date__c ) - DATETIMEVALUE(TODAY())),ABS(DATETIMEVALUE( Initiated_Date__c ) - DATETIMEVALUE(CompletedDateTime)))
CustomField.label: Initiated Since
